Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Protective Agent/Radioprotective Agent/RK-0202
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: An oral polymer matrix-based rinse formulation that contains N-acetylcysteine, an antioxidant amino acid derivative with antiinflammatory properties. RK-0202 may alleviate symptoms of radiation-induced oral mucositis. (NCI04)
